Class FXGLAudioPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.fxgl.audio.FXGLAudioPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public final class FXGLAudioPlayer
extends Object
implements AudioPlayer, UserProfileSavable
    FXGL provider of audio service.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

      • pauseMusic

        public void pauseMusic(Music music)
        Pauses given music if it was previously started with playSound(Sound). It can then be restarted by resumeMusic(Music).
        Specified by:
        pauseMusic in interface AudioPlayer
        Parameters:
        music - music to pause

      • resumeMusic

        public void resumeMusic(Music music)
        Resumes previously paused pauseMusic(Music) music.
        Specified by:
        resumeMusic in interface AudioPlayer
        Parameters:
        music - music to resume

      • stopMusic

        public void stopMusic(Music music)
        Stops currently playing music. It cannot be restarted using resumeMusic(Music). The music object needs to be started again by playMusic(Music).
        Specified by:
        stopMusic in interface AudioPlayer
        Parameters:
        music - music to stop

      • pauseAllMusic

        public void pauseAllMusic()
        Pauses all currently playing music. These can be resumed using resumeAllMusic().
        Specified by:
        pauseAllMusic in interface AudioPlayer

      • resumeAllMusic

        public void resumeAllMusic()
        Resumes all currently paused music.
        Specified by:
        resumeAllMusic in interface AudioPlayer

      • stopAllMusic

        public void stopAllMusic()
        Stops all currently playing music. The music cannot be restarted by calling resumeAllMusic(). Each music object will need to be started by playMusic(Music).
        Specified by:
        stopAllMusic in interface AudioPlayer
